Adisa Azapagić MBE FREng FRSC FIChemE (amụrụ na 10 Eprel 1961) bụ onye injinia kemịkal na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Prọfesọ nke Injinia kemịkal na-adịgide adịgide na Mahadum Manchester kemgbe afọ 2006.
A mụrụ Azapagic na 1961 na Tuzla, Bosnia na Herzegovina

Ọ gara Mahadum Tuzla, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1984 na nzere bachelọ na Injinia kemịkal. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ doctorate ya na Mahadum Surrey, wee nweta PhD ya na Environmental System Analysis site na iji nyocha nke ndụ na 1996.
Azapgic nọrọ na Mahadum Surrey afọ iri na atọ tupu ọ kwaga Mahadum Manchester
Ọ na-eduzi otu nyocha Sustainable Industrial Systems na Mahadum Manchester
Ọ na-eme ọtụtụ mmekorita ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere ọrụ ya na Procter & Gamble, Kraft Foods, Whirlpool Corporation
Na 2015 ọ meriri ihe nrite Mahadum Manchester maka uru pụtara ìhè nye ọha
Azapgic mepụtara ngwanrọ iji gbakọọ akara ụkwụ carbon na Mahadum Manchester (CCaLC).

Mmasị nyocha ya dị na injinia maka mmepe na-adịgide adịgide, nke gụnyere teknụzụ na-adịgidere, nyocha ndụ na carbon footprinting. N'afọ 2018 o gosipụtara na ụlọ ọrụ chocolate nke UK na-emepụta otu ọnụọgụ gas na-ekpo ọkụ dị ka Malta.
